sentences.english: The crowd was disappointed about the lack of enthusiam from the players.
sentences.chinese: 一些缺乏激情的选手们令观众大失所望。

sentences.english: His speech kindled the crowd with passion.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲使群众充满激情。

sentences.english: Writing is a renewed passion that I have re-discovered.
sentences.chinese: 写作是我重新发现的一个重燃的激情。

sentences.english: Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
sentences.chinese: 没一个伟大成就都是一颗激情燃烧的心所赢得的胜利。
不要把你的激情太过沉迷于流行文化。

sentences.english: Glowing candles burn our stirring passion;
sentences.chinese: 火红的烛焰燃烧着我们火红的激情。

sentences.english: He was baffled by their lack of enthusiam .
sentences.chinese: 他对他们缺少激情的状态感到很迷惑。

sentences.english: Sometimes sex sets you on fire and sometimes it is soothing.
sentences.chinese: 性爱有时会让你激情似火，有时使人得到慰藉。

sentences.english: This material inversion excites irregular, and as a consequence passionate, concern.
sentences.chinese: 物质的倒转引起不正常，结果是激情的关心。

sentences.english: He has never expected a touch to be so mysteriously arousing.
sentences.chinese: 他从没料到一个触碰能这般神秘地激起内心的激情。

sentences.english: I hope that, as you learn about podcasting, you'll share my enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我希望您在学习播客的过程中能够分享我的激情。

sentences.english: It seemed a poor excuse now, in the aftermath of such exhausting passion.
sentences.chinese: 如此竭尽激情的结果似乎是很可卑的理由。

sentences.english: Passion sparks dream, Sport opens a new chapter of communication.
sentences.chinese: 激情点燃梦想火焰，运动抒写东师华章。

sentences.english: Do you believe the "one-night stand" can evolve into love affair?
sentences.chinese: 一夜激情可能发展为恋情吗？

sentences.english: Flamenco is simply an art of living passionately.
sentences.chinese: 佛兰明歌是一种活出激情的艺术。

sentences.english: I always saw Andre playing with motivation and passion.
sentences.chinese: 我总是看到安德烈充满动力和激情的比赛。
